integrations.name: Judgeme Reviews
integrations.scope:
1. Text and ratings and supported on the PDP
2. Native implementation
3. Show review count on PLP, PDP 
4. Show reviews at the bottom of PDP (with ratings, reviews & images)

integrations.name: Loox Reviews
integrations.scope:
1. Text and ratings and supported on the PDP
2. Webview implementation
3. Show reviews on a separate page (webview modal)
integrations.limitations:
Webview implementation
Plan wise limitation from partner

integrations.name: Yotpo Reviews
integrations.scope:
1. Text and ratings and supported on the PDP
2. Native implementation
3. Show review count on PLP, PDP 
4. Show reviews at the bottom of PDP (with ratings, reviews & images)

integrations.name: Stamped Reviews
integrations.scope:
1. Text and ratings and supported on the PDP
2. Webview implementation
3. Show reviews on a separate page (webview modal)
integrations.limitations:
Webview implementation
Only supported on PDP

integrations.name: Facebook SDK
integrations.scope:
1. Android and iOS app integrated via react-native-fbsdk
2. Core app events (e.g., app activated, content viewed, purchases) tracked
3. Events sent to Meta’s Events Manager for reporting and analytics

integrations.name: Firebase Analytics
integrations.scope:
1. Capture automatic lifecycle events (e.g. first_open, app_update)
2. Send custom events to analyze feature usage and funnels
3. Segment audiences for remarketing and performance tracking
4. Export data to BigQuery for advanced analysis

integrations.name: Microsoft Clarity
integrations.scope:
1. Heatmaps (click, scroll, area): Visualize where users click, scroll depth, and engagement zones. Event tracking
2. Session recordings: Watch anonymized user sessions to observe actual interactions, navigation steps, and potential pain points.

integrations.name: Mixpanel
integrations.scope: 1. Capture automatic lifecycle events (e.g. first_open, app_update)- Basic events

integrations.name: DeltaX
integrations.scope:
1. Real-time event tracking (iOS & Android)
2. Cross-channel Tracking & Multi-touch Attribution
3, Support for deep linking

integrations.name: UXcam
integrations.scope:
1. Heatmaps (click, scroll, area): Visualize where users click, scroll depth, and engagement zones. Event tracking
2. Session recordings: Watch anonymized user sessions to observe actual interactions, navigation steps, and potential pain points.

integrations.name: Casa CRM
integrations.scope: 1. tracking key user and e-commerce events in the application. These events are originally captured in Appmaker and then brought into Casa for reporting, segmentation, and insights.

integrations.name: Clevertap
integrations.scope:
1. Real-time event tracking (iOS & Android)
2. Personalized push notifications & in-app messages
3. Advanced user segmentation & audience targeting
4. Pre-built campaign journeys (abandonment, re-engagement, onboarding)
5. Support for deep linking, product recommendations, and more
6. Cohort analysis and funnel tracking
integrations.limitations:
Interactive push notification (Will be available after the SDK upgrade to the latest version
Native display

integrations.name: Moengage
integrations.scope:
Real-time event tracking from your Appmaker-powered app (Supports both iOS and Android)
Send automated push notifications (transactional, campaign, and triggered)
Audience segmentation based on in-app behavior
Campaign automation workflows (cart abandonments, re-engagement, etc.)
Deep linking support, Push Amplification
Push Templates and In-App Notifications

integrations.name: Webengage
integrations.scope:
Real-time event tracking from your Appmaker-powered app (iOS and Android)
Automated push notifications (transactional, campaign, and triggered)
Audience segmentation based on in-app behavior
Campaign workflows (abandon carts, re-engagement, etc.)
Deep linking and in-app messaging
Push and in-app templates

integrations.name: Contlo
integrations.scope:
Event tracking (e.g., add to cart, product viewed)
Push notifications (Android, iOS)
Campaign flows & analytics

integrations.name: Klaviyo
integrations.scope:
Automatically sync real-time user behavior into Klaviyo
Trigger automated push and in-app notifications
Leverage intelligent segmentation based on user actions
Utilize Klaviyo’s native tools—rich push, silent push, badge management, deep links, and forms
Align mobile data with email/SMS journeys for a unified customer view

integrations.name: Wigzo
integrations.scope:
1.Event tracking (e.g., add to cart, product viewed)
2.Push notifications (Android, iOS)
3.Campaign flows & analytics
